A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Far more to dislike than like. I wanted background and completed storylines\, instead I get grumpy old codger Luke\, and then Leia flying ( literally!) through space. Rey was weak\, Poe was obnoxious\,  and Finn's escapade was a total nonsensical distraction.  I hope the execs at Disney realize that fans\, not critics\, will ultimately make these movies celebrated.  Lastly\,  I've never written a review before and didn't even have an account on here.  But I love Star Wars too much to see it ruined\, I needed to take action!
